Important update on holiday weekend gate access.

Holiday Weekend Gate Entry
To ensure a smooth and secure holiday weekend for everyone, we are implementing a required entry code system for all guests. Please review the important details below.
Entry Codes Required for All Guests
This holiday weekend, all guests will need a valid entry code to access the community. Please generate and send codes to your guests in advance to ensure they can enter without delay. Our staff will be available to address any necessary exceptions.
Attention: Renters & Property Managers
We have informed Lake Almanor Brokers and Coldwell Banker that all renters will be required to use their entry codes at the Visitor Side at Clifford Gate. Please communicate this to your rental guests to prevent confusion upon arrival.
Have a Safe and Enjoyable Holiday Weekend!
Lake Almanor Country Club | 501 Peninsula Drive | Lake Almanor, CA 96137
You are receiving this email as a member of the community.
